TopicTitle: Why don't my Solar Panels Deploy?

Articles.Content: I am trying to deploy my solar panels but when I right click on them, Nothing.. Just nothing. This issue started in 1.4, Please help.
Picture of the craft?  Do you have a manned pod or probe core with signal?
Are you out of power? Are the solar panels inside a cargo bay? If your craft is unmanned, does it have a connection?
